00031 // include files for KDE
00032 
00036 class ClustersPage : public ClustersLayout
00037 {
00038 Q_OBJECT
00039 public:
00040     ClustersPage(QWidget* parent = 0, const char* name = 0);
00041     ~ClustersPage();
00042 
00044   inline void setNbSamples(int nb){nbSamplesLineEdit->setText(QString("%1").arg(nb));};
00045 
00047   inline void setPeakIndex(int index){peakIndexLineEdit->setText(QString("%1").arg(index));};
00048 
00050   inline int getNbSamples()const{return nbSamplesLineEdit->text().toInt();};
00051 
00053   inline int getPeakIndex()const{return peakIndexLineEdit->text().toInt();};
00054   
00056   inline bool isModified()const{return modified;};
00057   
00059   inline void initialisationOver(){isInit = false;}
00060   
00061 public slots:
00062  
00064  inline void propertyModified(){if(!isInit) modified = true;};
00065   
00067  inline void resetModificationStatus(){modified = false;};
00068   
00069  private:
00070   QIntValidator intValidator;
00071   bool modified;
00072   bool isInit;
00073 };
